name: udPushComponentVersion
description: Deploy a new version of your IBM UrbanCode Deploy component, upload files, link back to build, and tag
helpMarkDown:
Deploy a new version of your IBM UrbanCode Deploy component, upload files, link back to build, and tag using the using the [IBM UrbanCode Deploy Client](http://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SS4GSP_6.2.1/com.ibm.udeploy.reference.doc/topics/cli_ch.html)
For more details about this task, to report bugs, or to contribute, refer to: [https://github.com/Microsoft/vsts-urbancode-deploy](https://github.com/Microsoft/vsts-urbancode-deploy)
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: serverEndpoint
inputs.label: IBM UrbanCode Deploy service endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service endpoint for your IBM UrbanCode Deploy server instance.  To create one, click the Manage link and create a new Generic Service Endpoint, enter the IBM UrbanCode Deploy server URL for the server URL, e.g. http://ucdserver.example.com:8080, and required credentials.  To use an authorization token, leave the user name blank, and enter the token in the password field.

inputs.name: udGlobalCommandArgs
inputs.label: Global Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Global arguments to be used by the underlying udclient, e.g. proxy information, for details, see: http://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SS4GSP_6.2.1/com.ibm.udeploy.reference.doc/topics/cli_ch.html

inputs.name: udComponentId
inputs.label: Component Name or Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name or id of the UrbanCode Deploy Component to update.

inputs.name: udComponentVersionName
inputs.label: Component Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name UrbanCode Deploy Component Version to create.  [Variables](https://www.visualstudio.com/docs/build/define/variables) might be helpful here, e.g. $(Build.BuildNumber)

inputs.name: fileToUpload
inputs.label: File to upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional file or directory to upload.  If a directory is specified, all contained files will be uploaded.  [Variables](https://www.visualstudio.com/docs/build/define/variables) might be helpful here, e.g. $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory) For more upload options, use the IBM UrbanCode Deploy Client (udclient) task in conjunction with the [addVersionFiles command](http://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SS4GSP_6.2.1/com.ibm.udeploy.api.doc/topics/udclient_addversionfiles.html)

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory to run the IBM UrbanCode Deploy Client commands.

inputs.name: udclientLocation
inputs.label: IBM UrbanCode Deploy Client location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally specify the location to the IBM UrbanCode Deploy Client (udclient). If the location is not specified, udclient needs to be in the PATH.
